description: There are few times where your favorite flannel won't fit the bill, but wear it enough times, and you might see it stops fitting you... This midweight fabrication holds up to everyday wear, ensuring it's in your closet for the long haul. With added stretch, even your buttoned-up, off-duty-dirtbag days never feel like a sacrifice. Move with comfort, not constraint, and keep going for a lifetime
name: Mountain Hardwear Catalyst Edge LS Shirt - Mens
